Stake iDNA to get Quadratic Staking rewa: Stake iDNA to get Quadratic Staking rewards
Quadratic Staking encourages people to s: Quadratic Staking encourages people to secure their identities with iDNA stakes, no matter how small, and ensures a democratic distribution of staking rewards.
Get staking rewards for improving securi: Get staking rewards for improving security of the protocol by locking iDNA in your identity stake. The larger the stake the higher the value of your identity.
Although you can earn rewards for securi: Although you can earn rewards for securing your identity, you can lose IDNA for missing or failing validation depending on your identity status.
You need to get a validated identity to: You need to get a validated identity to be able to stake iDNA.
The amount of staked coins does not affe: The amount of staked coins does not affect the voting power of your validated identity.
Quadratic Staking encourages smaller pla: Quadratic Staking encourages smaller players to increase their stakes. The lower the stake, the higher the percentage yield.
Share of your stake in the total amount: Share of your stake in the total amount of staked coins
